title: Hyperlinks: The Click That Connected Everything
description: A fast breakdown of Hyperlinks: The Click That Connected Everything for builders.

hook.text: Blue underlined text. You click it, and you're somewhere new. That simple idea built the web.

buildup.text: Before hyperlinks, moving between documents meant quitting one program and opening another.

discovery.text: Tim Berners-Lee made linking effortless: one click takes you from any page to any other page.

climax.text: Hyperlinks turned isolated documents into a connected web of human knowledge.

punchline.text: One click. Infinite connections. That's the hyperlink.
